text: Leiv Stensland (born 6 May 1934, in Odda) is a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Hordaland in 1985, and was re-elected on one occasion. Stensland was a member of Odda municipal council from 1959 to 1975 and 1979 to 1985, serving the last period as mayor. Outside politics he worked as an electrician from 1953 to 1978. ==References== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:Mayors of places in Hordaland Category:People from Odda Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Leiv Stensland
